live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to some of our affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51664.summary: are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
